or of 
the

actually
>=
 > memorize the order that you present them

ening! It's not the behavior I want in

Yes, it is =
more appropriate for RL domains.  In supervised 
classification tasks, it i=
s generally not realistic to allow it to 
memorize the order of presentatio=
ns because in the "real world" the
